summary: In October, you sent 656 USD (12,281 MXN) across 5 transfers to 1 receiver. Year to date, you've sent 656 USD, with Tejas receiving your full support this month.

insight1.text: By choosing Pangea, you gave Tejas about 262 MXN extra this month compared to the competition's lowest rate.
insight1.rationale: High Personal Specificity (mentions Tejas), Financial Relevance (extra MXN), and Positive Achievement (clear financial benefit).
